mbean.name: ClusteredSingleSignOn
mbean.description: A Valve that supports a 'single signon' user experience

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: cookieDomain
attribute.description: Domain to which sso cookies should be scoped

attribute.name: requireReauthentication
attribute.description: Should we attempt to reauthenticate each request against the security Realm?

attribute.name: clusterManager
attribute.description: SSOClusterManager to use for cluster support

attribute.name: clusterManagerClass
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the SSOClusterManager to use for cluster support

attribute.name: treeCacheName
attribute.description: The ObjectName of the TreeCache that this Valve should use for cluster communications. Only relevant if clusterManagerClass is org.jboss.web.tomcat.tc6.sso.TreeCacheSSOClusterManager
